name: Dungeon Janitor
description:
Dungeon Janitor is a game where you play as a Janitor who's job is to clean dungeons after heroes made their way into it. Heal monsters, repair torches, make your way through the top to earn your pay!

This is a 2 weeks projects, we wanted to make a game with a small scope just to train for game jams.

Made by @LucieLescuyer & @aStrkl

Music : Wild Boar's in - Brandon Fiechter.
